review: This device is a great buy.  It has many more apps than I thought when I bought it.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Could not get device to connect to network.  Called ISP and they said they have a lot of complaints about the Firestick.  Technician configured a new network which allowed the device to connect but would not maintain connection.  Tried watching Netflix.  Constant buffering then lost connection.  HDMI extender did not help.  Chromecast works fine.  Returning Firestick.
author: Gary K.

review: I purchase this to give it as a gift. I do not regret it. This device has been great and has worked perfectly since I bought it. It is a great gift that is being use on a daily basis. Would recommend it to anyone who is looking to have their first streaming device.
